Subskills.name: Spiked Shields
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by shield wall.

Subskills.name: Durable Wall
Subskills.description: Increases the durability and duration of shield wall.

Subskills.name: Gravitational Aegis
Subskills.description: Shield wall orbits in an orbit around you with increased projectile speed and increased amount of shields.

Subskills.name: More Shields
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of shields in shield wall.

Subskills.name: Split Reflection
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash spikes dealing damage towards the attacker when blocking a projectile.

Subskills.name: Defensive Radius
Subskills.description: Increases the orbiting radius of shield wall.

Subskills.name: Shield Growth
Subskills.description: Increases the size of shield wall.

Subskills.name: Critical Thorn
Subskills.description: Chance to critically hit dealing increased critical strike damage with shield wall.

Subskills.name: Insatiable Bulwark
Subskills.description: Blocking projectiles and attacks buff the shields increasing damage and size.

Subskills.name: Noxious Shields
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict poisoned when struck.

Subskills.name: Breaking Spikes
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict arcane break on hit.

Subskills.name: Dissolving Corrosion
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to poisoned targets.

Subskills.name: Porkupine Carapace
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict bleeding on hit with increased bleeding frequency.

Subskills.name: Shield Vortex
Subskills.description: Unleash a tornado of shields towards target location pulling nearby monsters towards it.
